attributes.action: instruct the banks to refund small claims courts fees already incurred for on hold claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Before the test case was announced the banks were refunding charges but only to those who took court action against them.

As the individual had to take court action and pay the required court fee the banks should be instructed to refund the court fees paid by claimants.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
